data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) Post Albuterol, Offspring Exam 9 and Omni 1 Exam 4. This dataset contains data on post-bronchodilator spirometry measurements.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: sdt_post_9_1
variable.comment: Date in dataset includes month , day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: rfvc_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) Reproducibility (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: FVC reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FVC values were not within 0.15 liters (>0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was not met
Two highest FVC values were within 0.15 liters (< = 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was met

variable.name: rfev_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume Reproducibility (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: FEV reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FEV values were not within 0.15 liters (> 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was not met
Two highest FEV values were within 0.15 liters (< = 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was met

variable.name: FV1_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 1 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: FV6_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 6 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not best effort, Albuterol

variable.name: FV3_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 3 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not best effort, Albuterol

variable.name: FVC_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: PF_post_9_1
variable.description: Peak Expiratory Flow (lit./sec.) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not best effort, Albuterol

variable.name: TFVC_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Time (seconds) - Highest FVC value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol
variable.comment: TFVC_POST_9_1 is the forced expiratory time of the acceptable maneuver with the highest FVC.

variable.name: RBB_post_9_1
variable.description: Ratio Best FEV1 / Best FVC (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: RBB_POST_9_1 is the ratio of the best FEV1 and the best FVC, which can come from different acceptable efforts.

variable.name: MMF_post_9_1
variable.description: Maximum Mid Expiratory Flow Rate (lit./sec.) - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: FF1_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 25% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.), - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: FF2_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 50% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.), - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: FF3_post_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 75% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.) - Best Effort, Albuterol
